### **Topics:**

* \[Ijeoma\]: [(docs): add cli plugins to extensibility docs page](https://github.com/meshery/meshery/pull/16441) PR \#16441  
* \[Lee Calcote\]: Discussion of “[overly permissive RBAC configuration](https://groups.google.com/a/meshery.dev/g/security/c/kPJoIyI39fk/m/mI2M9dztAQAJ)” security vulnerability report. Present and review proposed changes.   
  1. Use of escalate/bind as a function of Meshery Model registration and enablement via the \`status\` property.  
  2. Impersonation \+ Per-Object ServiceAccount Delegation  
* \[Aabid Sofi\]: New build-time extension point  
* \[Divyanshi Pathak\] – Introduction \+ relationship-definition contribution discussion.  
* \[Ritesh Karankal\]: Publish latest schema version to website [\#473](https://github.com/meshery/schemas/pull/473)
